lead_paragraph: As a result of an investigation, the federal Education Department announced that the city agreed to revamp its procedures.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Agency Says Yonkers Flouted Rules on Special Ed
headline.main: Yonkers Schools Flouted Rules on Special Education, U.S. Agency Says

snippet: As a result of an investigation, the federal Education Department announced that the city agreed to revamp its procedures....
abstract: Federal Education Dept announces that Yonkers Public Schools will revamp its special-education procedures; federal civil rights investigation found city was not following federal law requiring placement of children with disabilities in regular classrooms whenever possible, along with individualized lesson plans.
